Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to produce labeled activities with rationale. Use LaTeX for math. Provide explanation. No code needed.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: We'll identify phases: idle (initial low values), cutting (high temp, vibration, flow, tool movement), assembling (moderate temp, pressure, flow), welding (very high temp, vibration, energy), cooling/inspection (temp drop, low activity), final idle.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Provide mapping of event numbers to phases. Use tables maybe. Ensure LaTeX inline. Use double $$ for display math if needed. Provide final answer.
